text: Christel DeHaan (nee Stark, October 20, 1942 – June 6, 2020) was a German-born American businesswoman and philanthropist. She was the owner of Resort Condominiums International and the founder of Christel House International. DeHaan was born in Nördlingen, Germany. DeHaan died on June 6, 2020 at her home in Indianapolis, Indiana at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Philanthropists from Indiana Category:German businesspeople Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Indianapolis
title: Christel DeHaan
